ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] RE: Monk Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I think I understand this, but let me be sure.  Shackles can only be worn by Iksar?  If this is true, is it possible for an Iksar monk to complete all of
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I think I understand this, but let me be sure. Shackles can only be
worn by Iksar? If this is true, is it possible for an Iksar monk to
complete all of the monk quest Human and Iksar?


>From: InDicuS <indicus@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>Subject: [EQ-Monks] RE: Monk Quests
>Date: Thu, 25 Jan 2001 17:19:14 -0500 (EST)
>
>Great reply, thanks for the info on shackle of steel, could you post a
>breakdown of the quest, I am gonna be starting this failry soon, maybe I
>can
>begin collecting whatever items are needed now. I think the stell shackle
>will be a perfect compliment ot my items, and I have a new found
>appreciation for Magic resistance since I obtained my bronze shackle.
>Stats
>are great on the Steel one though.
>
>Any info you can provide to easy my quest would be appreciated.
>
>
>
>I was in my mid twenties when I finished the shackle of Bronze quest.
>
>
>Indicus Velox
>35 rank SwiftTail Caste
>Saryrn
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Thomas Kirchner
>To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 3:18 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Monk Quests
>
>
>All shackles are Iksar only, I have had all of them. I currently sport a
>Shackle of Steel and Shackle of Bronze.
>Shackle of Bronze: 6 ac 5 vs magic 0.2 weight.
>Shackle of Steel: 9 ac 5 str 5 sta 5 vs magic 0.1 weight.
>The Shackle of Bronze quest can be done in your high 20's low 30's with a
>group I'd say. Mostly for safety, and the pieces in Permafrost and
>Frontier
>Mountains, the rest is foraging and an easy quest.
>The Shackle of Steel in your low to mid 40's with a group. That Droga
>section can be tough.
>Fenedar
>Innoruuk
>
>
>
>
>
>If someone is going to do the shackle quests, and they have not finished
>all
>needed factions, but are going to use illlusions or wolf form I suggest
>gathering all the items upto the shackle of Copper and getting the box for
>shackle of Bronze. the actual shackle is givin out by Master Rinmark in
>Timourous Deep. and he initiates the shackle of Steel aswell.
>
>
